Room.Name: Amberton Lane/Neilian Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Amberton Lane and Neilian Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Amberton Lane heads to the south from the intersection of Neilian Drive, which runs east and west. To the north, you can see the short cliffs overlooking the river Othax. On the southeast corner of the road, you can see a number of more unique religious shrines for other humanoid dieties.
